channel.title: Undergraduate Researchers on Karstens Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Undergraduate Researchers on Karstens Lab

item.title: Alec Barstad
item.description: Alec Barstad is a graduate of Portland Community College’s Bioscience Technology Technical training program. He is also a member of the sixth cohort of Build EXITO scholars and is pursuing a Bachelor’s of Science degree in Biochemistry. He has been with the lab for two years now and his contributions have been in microbiology (EQUC) and data informatics (RStudio)

item.title: Emory Neer
item.description:
Emory Neer studies public health and geographic information systems at Portland State. She has worked in the Karstens Lab as a part of the Build EXITO program on creating a universially colorblind friendly palette.

https://www.pdx.edu/exito/
